name: 郭天穎
objective: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解數位訊號處理的理論基礎及其應用技巧。課程內容包含：(1) 離散傅立葉轉換及快速傅立葉轉換 (2) Z - 轉換在信號處理上之應用 (3) 相關函數，迴旋積分及其應用 (4) FIR 數位濾波器設計 (5) IIR 數位濾波器設計 (6) 適應性訊號處理介紹 (7) 工程應用及實例研討。
schedule:
week 1 Introduction and Background – Sinusoids, Complex Signals.
week 2 Spectrum Representation 　
week 3 Spectrum Representation 　
week 4 Sampling and Aliasing 　
week 5 Sampling and Aliasing 　
week 6 FIR Filtersweek 7 FIR Filters
week 8 Miterm Exam 1 　
week 9 Frequency Response of FIR Filters.　
week 10 Frequency Response of FIR Filters. 　
week 11 Z-Transforms 　
week 12 Z-Transforms 　
week 13 Miterm Exam 2 　
week 14 IIR Filters. 　
week 15 IIR Filters.
week 16 IIR Filters.DTFT, DFT, FFT.
week 17 DTFT, DFT, FFT. 　
week 18 Final Exam
